item.title: I Will Still Be Whole (When You Rip Me in Half)/ Before I Was a Bear
item.author: Kestrel Maio,
item.description: 4 stars I Will Still Be Whole (When You Rip Me in Half) harnesses you from the offset, the two characters stand facing outwards towards the audience, hands by their sides and speaking with urgency. It describes the events that take place for a young woman, EJ (Aoife Hinds), and her estranged mother, â€¦
